description: Checks status of the deployment status for given execution id on the node where the task is run

node_fqdn.description: The lightweight component node to which the probe will be sent.

deploy_status_file.description: The location of the deploy_status_file on the LC node where the probes are run.

execution_id.description: The execution_id of the lightweight component whose deployment is to be monitored.

retry_interval.description: Number of seconds after which the probe will be resent to monitor deployment status

max_retries.description: Max number of times a probe should be sent before a timeout occurs.
